main event: A young male student reported seeing a silverish-white UFO with five objects in Sharon, Massachusetts on October 6, 1961.
interesting points: The objects appeared to stand still at times and then suddenly speed up and rush away.
The witness estimated the speed of the objects to be around 100 miles per hour.
The objects were described as being bright and sharply outlined.
Another witness, Warren Stein, also saw the objects.
The witness had previously seen other unidentified objects, such as red and green lights circling an airplane.
sighted object: five silverish-white objects in the sky
